title: Ticket #2181: Startd crashes running benchmarks, only on Windows
description:
The 7.6.1 RC running on the CS windows pool the startd always crashes running the benchmarks: 

"\\afs\cs.wisc.edu\unsup\condor\bin\condor_startd.exe" on "pane01.cs.wisc.edu" died due to exception ACCESS_VIOLATION.
Condor will automatically restart this process in 10 seconds.

*** Last 20 line(s) of file c:\Program Files\condor/log/StartLog:
05/20/11 09:56:19 Return from Timer handler 34 (dc_touch_log_file)
05/20/11 09:57:19 Calling Timer handler 35 (dc_touch_log_file)
05/20/11 09:57:19 Return from Timer handler 35 (dc_touch_log_file)
05/20/11 09:57:50 Calling Timer handler 6 (DaemonCore::SendAliveToParent)
05/20/11 09:57:50 DaemonCore: in SendAliveToParent()

05/20/11 09:57:50 DaemonCore: Leaving SendAliveToParent() - success
05/20/11 09:57:50 Return from Timer handler 6 (DaemonCore::SendAliveToParent)
05/20/11 09:58:19 Calling Timer handler 9 (eval_and_update_all)
05/20/11 09:58:19 Swap space: 3629892
05/20/11 09:58:19 Idle Time: user= 1200 , console= 0 seconds

05/20/11 09:58:19 slot2: State change: IS_OWNER is false

05/20/11 09:58:19 State change: RunBenchmarks is TRUE
05/20/11 09:58:19 BenchMgr:StartBenchmarks()
05/20/11 09:58:19 ShouldStartBenchmarks: load=0.00 max=0.10
05/20/11 09:58:19 ShouldStartJob: job=1.00 cur=0.00 max=1.00
05/20/11 09:58:19 CronJob: Starting job 'MIPS' (/unsup/condor/libexec/condor_mips)
*** End of file StartLog
remarks:
2011-May-20 16:39:59 by tstclair:
clearly has a muck'd config, unable to repro externally

2011-May-25 16:05:53 by tannenba:
Able to repo on CSL Windows 7 machines. Found problem, pushing fix to v7.6.1. Once we drop Win XP and 32 bit Vista support from Condor, we should rip support for 16bit apps out of daemoncore.
check_ins: 2011-May-25 16:06   Check-in [21984]: On Windows, in daemoncore Create_Process, fix bug in testing to see if an executable is 16bit or not where we would sparadically core dump if the executable was not readable/non-existant. #2181 [...] (By Todd Tannenbaum )
creator: gthain
